heading: Inspection and test reports submission
text:
Inspection and test reports shall be submitted on forms in such manner as
  required by the commissioner. Each inspection and test report shall include a listing of all violations for each device inspected and
  tested associated with the wastewater recycling system. A copy of the report, signed by the inspector performing the inspection and
  tests shall be delivered to the owner within 30 days of the site visit. All reports shall be kept on file by the approved agency and the
  owner for a period of at least 6 years.
